examples: Have a cigarette!
Can you spare me a cigarette?
She ached for a cigarette.
Cigarette smoke filled the room.
I was desperate for a cigarette.
Poirot proffered him a cigarette.
Can I cadge a cigarette from you?
Jo smokes the odd cigarette.
Can I cop a cigarette from you?
He stopped to light a cigarette.
I caught her smoking a cigarette.
He lit a cigarette and handed it to her.
He pulled hard on the cigarette.
an ashtray full of cigarette stubs
She tapped ash from her cigarette.
He used to roll his own cigarettes.
Frank took a drag on his cigarette.
a total ban on cigarette advertising
He took a long drag on the cigarette.
She took a long pull on her cigarette.
She took a long drag on her cigarette.
His body was covered in cigarette burns.
She lit a cigarette to calm herself down.
The cigarette burned a hole in the carpet.
He was clenching a cigarette in his teeth.
I fumbled around in my bag for a cigarette.
The cigarette smoked unheeded in her fingers.
Maltravers took a long draw on his cigarette.
He flicked his cigarette butt out the window.
He extinguished his cigarette in the ashtray.
example_translate: Джо нет-нет да и выкурит сигаретку.
Он поджёг сигарету и отдал ей.
Его тело покрывали ожоги от сигарет.
Я пошарил у себя в сумке в поисках сигареты.
Сигарета дымилась в её пальцах, но она словно позабыла о ней.
Резким щелчком он выбросил окурок из окна.
